analysis.description:
Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/8/0x88b6d8d018118f6da4842fae44d39e2bc52b75aa.sol#200-202) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/8/0x88b6d8d018118f6da4842fae44d39e2bc52b75aa.sol#201-202)

AllowanceCrowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/8/0x88b6d8d018118f6da4842fae44d39e2bc52b75aa.sol#362-369) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(tokenWallet,_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/8/0x88b6d8d018118f6da4842fae44d39e2bc52b75aa.sol#368)
ERC20Basic.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/8/0x88b6d8d018118f6da4842fae44d39e2bc52b75aa.sol#60) should be declared external
